levels.title: Tutorial 1: Walls and pellets
levels.body: In McMinos levels have walls. You cannot pass through them. Go and eat all pellets to finish a level.
levels.body_de: In McMinos-Spielebenen gibt es Wände. Du kannst nicht durch Wände gehen. Geh und sammel alle Pillen ein, um eine Spielebene zu beenden.

levels.title: Tutorial 2: Ghost Hanky
levels.body: The ghosts live in castles. When they come out, they hunt you. Eating a cookie gives you enough power to hunt the ghosts - for a short while.

levels.title: Chocolate
levels.body: Collect chocolate in your toolbox. Eat it to hunt ghosts.

levels.title: Tutorial 4: Of doors and keys
levels.body: Collect all keys you find in a level. You may need them to open doors. Or to close them again.

levels.title: Tutorial 5: Rock, rock me, baby!
levels.body: Push the rocks around to fence-in ghosts. Or push them on the corresponding rock-me fields to finish the level.

levels.title: Tutorial 6: Go, get the jumping peas!
levels.body: It's easy to eat the peas along the way to finish a level, right? Well, not if they run away. Go, get them!

levels.title: Tutorial 8: Small holes, big holes
levels.body: Small holes grow, and down large holes you go.

levels.title: Tutorial 9: Warp holes
levels.body: Jump into one, exit from another.

levels.title: Tutorial 10: Potions good and bad
levels.body: Don't touch the poisoned potion. Be sure to have medicine on you, just in case.

levels.title: Tutorial 11: Dynamite
levels.body: If you see me running, try to keep up.

levels.title: Tutorial 13: Mirror, mirror on the wall
levels.body: Left is right and up is down.

levels.title: Tutorial 14: Speedy race
levels.body: Speeding can be a life saver.

levels.title: Tutorial 15: Don't drink and ...
levels.body: If you get drunk you lose control. Just don't.

levels.title: Tutorial 16: Infinite world
levels.body: Where does it start? Where does it end? Can you tell? I think, I have been here before.
